title: Hewlet
author: Hewlet
content: As you journey through every phase and stage of life, one of the determining factor that guarantee if you will be successful at what you do or not is the price you will have to pay to achieving success. There are times that you will have to cut off from so many friends just to be focused enough to facing your goals, there will come a time when you might even starve yourself just to get data to do your research on YouTube and other platforms just to become good at the thing you are doing. There are times you will have to endure and cope with the excesses of others just to learn from them, as a matter of fact, if you are not ready to endure whatever comes along with gaining knowledge, you will never learn a thing. Some might take away your night rest and for some persons, they can't even remember the last time they slept complete five hours every night and some might have  forgotten that people even still sleep in the afternoon. These are just a few of the so many sacrifices you will have to make depending on the peculiarity of what you are doing, just to become relevant and successful. This is the same route every successful person took that has brought them that far and if you ever aspire to be like them, you will need to pay your own price or take the risk of cutting corners and paying the bigger price that might even cost you your life.Apart from the fact that we are all bitcoinner, I believe one common thing I find among us is the fact that we are all individual that are very passionate and committed at becoming successful at what we do and I hope this meets someone well out there.

comments.author: Odohu
comments.body: Thanks for brining up this topic as it has reinvigorated me a little because I have been overwhelmed by workload as the year is drawing to an end and a part of me has become so discouraged and weak. Reading through this post has this way of infusing positive energy and made me realise that everything effort I have to put is for a greater good.  I have always motivated myself with the saying that "no oain, no gain",  a popular word among those that engages in physical exercise like the gym. Lately, that word seems to have lost its value but I guess I'm back on track. I'm more than ready to pay the price!

comments.author: Richbased
comments.body: Op you make sense a lot, one thing I believe in life is that nothing good that will last forever in someone's life that can be achieved on a platter of gold as it requires commitment, devotion, time, money and sacrifices to reach ones destination. Sometimes in life it requires us to lose things we cherish most in other to value the things we have. And again in this life someone doesn't need to be isolated like whatever legit that you see others are doing to meet up life obligation just give it a try no matter how complex it may be but from time to time you might be well in it and even perform better than the people that started before you. Most times one of the things that has made alot of people not to reach their destination is fear of failure like if the get involved and failed how will the society look at them, it is important for us to understand that failure is a link road to success as if you don't encounter different challenges in what you choose to do, you may not value it that much. We live to learn everyday in this life as no one is an island of knowledge so don't be shy from learning new things even if you find it difficult to comprehend it just continue trying as a day will come when you will understand even more than the people that understood it before you. We shouldn't be afraid to take a step in life a our bold steps sometimes leads us to our destination.

comments.author: target
comments.body: Some successful people pay a higher price because they leave home to go abroad and work there for more than 10 years. They come back successful but have no one in their life but themselves. I know one personally who lived by himself all along in his own house, his girlfriend married someone else and his parents died while he was far from his home. He is now almost 50 and still alone but he does have houses of his own, a car, and have thriving Airbnb business.

comments.author: Doan9269
comments.body: Quote from: Hewlet on November 24, 2023, 02:42:18 PMApart from the fact that we are all bitcoinner, I believe one common thing I find among us is the fact that we are all individual that are very passionate and committed at becoming successful at what we do and I hope this meets someone well out there.If you're a good person, then you will always be attracted to other good people around, if you're determined for success in life, it's a matter of time, such would not be far away from you, every tree bears the same fruits of its kind, what you set as target in life could be achieved and turn a success if we never give up in it, we also need to render some level of sacrifice, which is our own personal efforts in showing how determined we are to achieve success in life.

comments.author: Samlucky O
comments.body: Sometimes success is like a trap that wants to bring you down. But surely never what it meant to. For success to come into accomplishment you need time, dedication, study in and out, frequent questions, admitting to falt, talking less and reason more, consistency, creativity and many other factors.Being successful is not easy. that's why we have dream and wishes. If we have dreams and can't fufill the dream it's becomes a dead dream or a wish. So there is no successful person without a story. That's why when successful people talks, it becomes a philosophy. Because they have atain a hight you have never been, and there words serves as motivation to push you to a greater hight.

comments.author: Rockstarguy
comments.body: Quote from: Hewlet on November 24, 2023, 02:42:18 PMThere are times you will have to endure and cope with the excesses of others just to learn from them, as a matter of fact, if you are not ready to endure whatever comes along with gaining knowledge, you will never learn a thing. Some might take away your night rest and for some persons, they can't even remember the last time they slept complete five hours every night and some might have  forgotten that people even still sleep in the afternoon. Nothing good in life comes easy, everything that has value one has to pay a good price just to possess it.  But the joy of everything is that the stress and the tough times in striving to get this done , the result is always sweet.  Hardworks pays for sure , it can be very challenging but people should not get distracted by what they will see but keep on grinding knowing that the result will change all the pain during the process joy. For those who really understand where they are heading to , they won't be distracted by what they may come across on their way to success because they know challenge is a normal accurance when chasing after greatness.

comments.author: Abdulzuruku01
comments.body: Quote from: Hewlet on November 24, 2023, 02:42:18 PMAs you journey through every phase and stage of life, one of the determining factor that guarantee if you will be successful at what you do or not is the price you will have to pay to achieving success. There are times that you will have to cut off from so many friends just to be focused enough to facing your goals, there will come a time when you might even starve yourself just to get data to do your research on YouTube and other platforms just to become good at the thing you are doing. There are times you will have to endure and cope with the excesses of others just to learn from them, as a matter of fact, if you are not ready to endure whatever comes along with gaining knowledge, you will never learn a thing. Some might take away your night rest and for some persons, they can't even remember the last time they slept complete five hours every night and some might have  forgotten that people even still sleep in the afternoon. These are just a few of the so many sacrifices you will have to make depending on the peculiarity of what you are doing, just to become relevant and successful. This is the same route every successful person took that has brought them that far and if you ever aspire to be like them, you will need to pay your own price or take the risk of cutting corners and paying the bigger price that might even cost you your life.Apart from the fact that we are all bitcoinner, I believe one common thing I find among us is the fact that we are all individual that are very passionate and committed at becoming successful at what we do and I hope this meets someone well out there.It's true that when you don't work, you don't expect to gain. Being successful in life is not an easy tasks, you must sacrifice lot of things and face many challenges along the way. All you have to do is keep pushing yourself and keep trying.All of us dream of of being successful in life, but real success requires more than just words, it requires making sacrifices and committing time in order for it to be attained. Not every problem that someone shares can be solved, sometimes you have to excludes certain individuals from your plan, particularly those you considered friends, I picked football as my career, and I'm working hard to achieve it. but my friends always discourage me, which makes me feel weak and makes me decide not to go on. However, your message has inspired me to keep going.

comments.author: KingsDen
comments.body: Quote from: target on November 24, 2023, 03:03:41 PMSome successful people pay a higher price because they leave home to go abroad and work there for more than 10 years. They come back successful but have no one in their life but themselves. I know one personally who lived by himself all along in his own house, his girlfriend married someone else and his parents died while he was far from his home. He is now almost 50 and still alone but he does have houses of his own, a car, and have thriving Airbnb business.This kind of story happens in the olden days, I am surprised it still happened in this recent time. I have thought that the people of recent time care much about family and relatives that they would not agree to leave them. But in the race to success, everything is possible to do. I am glad that in the end he made it to be rich but there are some initial happiness that he sacrificed.Regarding the discussion in OP, it is not everyone that always pay such prices. There are people whose parents have already paid the price for that they don't suffer any more.

comments.author: Bureau
comments.body: Why such a big wall of text? Why can't it be broken into paragraph that can be easy to read?. I skipped most of it as reading through a dense text of words gets me anxiety attack. As I have issues, I tend to ignore such topics. I still went through all of it and I realised it was all about motivation. Why would someone create a topic on motivation? Nothing in that topic speaks the truth as for my understanding it is all hypothetical. After reading the replies I felt the whole thread is scripted. If anyone here is not form the OP local board can you verify my suspicion.

comments.author: Vaculin
comments.body: Quote from: Hewlet on November 24, 2023, 02:42:18 PMAs you journey through every phase and stage of life, one of the determining factor that guarantee if you will be successful at what you do or not is the price you will have to pay to achieving success. There are times that you will have to cut off from so many friends just to be focused enough to facing your goals, there will come a time when you might even starve yourself just to get data to do your research on YouTube and other platforms just to become good at the thing you are doing. There are times you will have to endure and cope with the excesses of others just to learn from them, as a matter of fact, if you are not ready to endure whatever comes along with gaining knowledge, you will never learn a thing. Some might take away your night rest and for some persons, they can't even remember the last time they slept complete five hours every night and some might have  forgotten that people even still sleep in the afternoon. These are just a few of the so many sacrifices you will have to make depending on the peculiarity of what you are doing, just to become relevant and successful. This is the same route every successful person took that has brought them that far and if you ever aspire to be like them, you will need to pay your own price or take the risk of cutting corners and paying the bigger price that might even cost you your life.Apart from the fact that we are all bitcoinner, I believe one common thing I find among us is the fact that we are all individual that are very passionate and committed at becoming successful at what we do and I hope this meets someone well out there. Success is not achieved instantly by exposing yourself to the sweet realities in life, but its certainly bitter at first that turns sweet in the process. That is why for you to gain success, one should learn to take the risk and overcome it, otherwise you will never find success on every aspect of your life. While success comes easier to those who are born with golden spoon, but for those who are born poor and empty, they still need to pay the price first by embracing life's struggles and hardships first before they can taste the success in life.All successful individuals have been living this legacy as everyone should start from a scratch before they reach their successful position in life at the moment, except for those who are favored by great opportunities in the first place.

comments.author: bluebit25
comments.body: The tradeoff to achieve success is something that always happens, but anyone who has ever tasted the taste of victory will understand that feeling of happiness, it gives us peace of mind and invisibly guides us to perfection. With life having so many different nuances, no one's life will be the same as yours (some similarities), but the difference is independence, so we can harmonize into a peaceful group. The competitive element is always pre programmed in each of us, when it comes to the desire to have more knowledge, or from another perspective, anyone needs to complete all their lessons, no matter the size. No matter what, the end result is always the same.

comments.author: nakamura12
comments.body: If a person is successful then he/she have a lot of patience and willing to take risk while he/she also put his/her effort to become successful or get what he/she want or to achieve his/her goal. Obstacles are there for us to fail and learn from it until we will get past it and if a person who are dedicated to do things that are within his/her skills and willing to learn new things that he/she haven't learned yet and they will surely reach it once that person is experienced enough. You can say that there's ups and downs before you become successful.

comments.author: Sanitough
comments.body: That's what life is. If you aim to succeed on your life, then pay the price but still never expect that the outcome will always favor on you. Sometimes, what you assumed does not happen, but the opposite is. You need to stay patient and positive minded despite of the risks and hardships you need to endure, if you can overcome that, you will see then a more positive outcome.Everything in life has always its corresponding risks and threats, if you are weak you fail, but if you are strong and chose to stand on your goals, you will succeed later on.

comments.author: CryptopreneurBrainboss
comments.body: Quote from: Hewlet on November 24, 2023, 02:42:18 PMApart from the fact that we are all bitcoinner, I believe one common thing I find among us is the fact that we are all individual that are very passionate and committed at becoming successful at what we do and I hope this meets someone well out there.Lets bring this to the forum, those who are willing to pay the price are those that are becoming successful on the forum, it's not a surprise when you see other users that you both started your journey on the forum around the same time but they're doing better and you're not. It means they're doing something that you aren't doing. They're dedicating time to learn about Bitcoin and other quality discussion to introduced into the forum and they get rewarded for it. We have to make scarified if we want to succeed in life. We have to learn to put in the work first before we start looking for rewards. When investing in Bitcoin too, only the patience ones get rewarded. Those who are building their portfolio by DCA are the ones that'll be rewarded the most at the end of the bull market so if we wish to be among them then we have to increase our hustling power so we can generate enough funds that'll be used in purchasing Bitcoin for holding. When we accumulating during this periods that others are panicking or keeps hodling our position in Bitcoin, it means we're paying the price others aren't willing to pay and Bitcoin will reward is at the end with profits beyond our imagination.

comments.author: tabas
comments.body: It is because when you're trying to focus on something, you need to sacrifice a lot of things just for you to make that laser-focus mind on it. That's why we need to let go of so many things that we used to do and that's fine because it's also part of growing. Like having your own family and you forget about your friends but that doesn't mean that they're no longer your friends but the time that you can allocate to them is much better be allocated to your family. And the same goes in focusing in Bitcoin or learning more about it and then the application goes by what you've learned into earning. Success requires a lot of time for you take it but if you ever reached to that point and you can finally say that you've made it, it's going to be along with words like 'it's worth it'.

comments.author: hatshepsut93
comments.body: Quote from: Hewlet on November 24, 2023, 02:42:18 PMThere are times that you will have to cut off from so many friends just to be focused enough to facing your goals, there will come a time when you might even starve yourself just to get data to do your research on YouTube and other platforms just to become good at the thing you are doing. This isn't really true for Bitcoin, it doesn't require that much effort. All you truly need to know is how to safely use it, and then if you're an investor you just wait for years till you are satisfied with your profit. Learning about Bitcoin in-depth is useful, but it won't affect your profits. And short-term trading is just gambling, no amount of research will help you be consistently profitable, so it's best to just focus on long-term investing.

comments.author: JunaidAzizi
comments.body: Quote from: Hewlet on November 24, 2023, 02:42:18 PMAs you journey through every phase and stage of life, one of the determining factor that guarantee if you will be successful at what you do or not is the price you will have to pay to achieving success. There are times that you will have to cut off from so many friends just to be focused enough to facing your goals, there will come a time when you might even starve yourself just to get data to do your research on YouTube and other platforms just to become good at the thing you are doing. There are times you will have to endure and cope with the excesses of others just to learn from them, as a matter of fact, if you are not ready to endure whatever comes along with gaining knowledge, you will never learn a thing. Some might take away your night rest and for some persons, they can't even remember the last time they slept complete five hours every night and some might have  forgotten that people even still sleep in the afternoon. These are just a few of the so many sacrifices you will have to make depending on the peculiarity of what you are doing, just to become relevant and successful. This is the same route every successful person took that has brought them that far and if you ever aspire to be like them, you will need to pay your own price or take the risk of cutting corners and paying the bigger price that might even cost you your life.Apart from the fact that we are all bitcoinner, I believe one common thing I find among us is the fact that we are all individual that are very passionate and committed at becoming successful at what we do and I hope this meets someone well out there. From the age when a child crosses the digit of 12 in the age he started thinking about his future and his success. He starts working to become a successful person in the future and for the bagian from the education. Spending 16 To 18 years in education he then looked for a job and in that duration, he ran from here and there just to get a job. After completing an education what he needed from the government was a job and his family expected from him a job but mostly we saw that the government is disabled and we get nothing. A person then looking for a job out of his field just to feed his family and I mostly saw most people did not get even a private job because of the economic condition of the country and the last what he doing was suicide or living a very poor life and that is a destination for what we sacrifice most beautiful things of our life. Spending 18 years on education and a lot of money it will be safe if he spends half of the fund on investment in Bitcoin. Because after some time I am sure Bitcoin will return him a very good profit, I am not in opposition to education but only depending on education is wrong, man needs to explore more things and increase his independence.

comments.author: Out of mind
comments.body: Quote from: Hewlet on November 24, 2023, 02:42:18 PMApart from the fact that we are all bitcoinner, I believe one common thing I find among us is the fact that we are all individual that are very passionate and committed at becoming successful at what we do and I hope this meets someone well out there.The way we live and the way we live and the way we work are all driven towards success. We have to accept the fact that if we make money from Bitcoin, we plan to leave it for our future and work towards success. Success does not come easily to a person, but he has to wait for a long time and work hard enough. We know hard work is the key of all, so work hard and achieve success without hard work you can never get the key to success. If you set yourself up for success, future success is sure to come your way. That's why you have to be hardworking in any work, and you have to have target to move forward, only then you can fulfill the target in your future and get success.

comments.author: hugeblack
comments.body: I somewhat agree, but you should make your goals greater than investing in Bitcoin and collecting more, but rather learning. Financial knowledge is important, especially if you start acquiring it at a young age, and with the available opportunities and first two jobs, you can achieve profits that will make you financially liberated before the age of 30, which means more time to study and learn. .The forum should not be your only source of income or your lifestyle should change according to the profits you make from the forum. Rather, you should learn more skills and make your investments here an opportunity for real change at the level of yourself, your family, or even your local community.
